item.title: Bike 600km roadtrip
item.description:
My Cycling Adventures: A Journey of Lessons and Exploration

The goal of this post is to share my cycling road trip experiences, the challenges I encountered, and the lessons learned along the way.

Edition 1: Paris - Cabourg

My first trip, Paris - Cabourg (240 km in 2 days), was done with no preparation. We left with way too many bungee cords on our bikesâ€”first mistake. The second mistake became clear the next morning: painful saddle sores. Advice: wear cycling shorts for this kind of trip!
